content.raw:
This looks hard to maintain, every time we add a new child to model, we need to come back here and update this not to use that as a link.

In the future, it might be a nice idea to place links under something like `model.links` or to mark links with some flag that identifies them as links. I can already see problems related to nested models.
content.html:
This looks hard to maintain, every time we add a new child to model, we need to come back here and update this not to use that as a link.

In the future, it might be a nice idea to place links under something like model.links or to mark links with some flag that identifies them as links. I can already see problems related to nested models.
